etymons.notes: sexî adj. ar. généreux, euse; sexî kirin (İlyas p.c)

Preterit.turoyo: Meqəm ṭurone kətwa u ʕamo d-əmmat lo masxewa d-qoṭaʕwa. 2019_13_01_Malfono_İshaq

tokens.value: u ʕamo d-əmmat lo masxewa d-qoṭaʕwa. 2019_13_01_Malfono_İshaq

Preterit.text: Meqəm ṭurone kətwa, u ʕamo d-əmmat lo masxewa d-qoṭaʕwa. 2019_13_01_Malfono_İshaq

Preterit.turoyo: U Ḥabib lo masxele d-oxal u malayḏe w maṯ kafino. İlyas p.c Habib did not dare to spend his property and died of hunger.

tokens.value: U Ḥabib lo masxele d-oxal u malayḏe w maṯ kafino.
Habib did not dare to spend his property and died of hunger.

Preterit.text: U Ḥabib lo masxele d-oxal u malayḏe w maṯ kafino. (İlyas p.c) Habib did not dare to spend his property and died of hunger.

idioms: to be generous, to dare to spend (normally used with negation –lo)
